channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Azure Managed Instance for Apache Cassandra
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Azure Managed Instance for Apache Cassandra

item.title: CVE-2024-38175|2024-08-20T18:15:57.138Z -- microsoft -- azure%20managed%20instance%20for%20apache%20cassandra
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability in the Azure Managed Instance for Apache Cassandra allows an authenticated attacker to elevate privileges over a network.
